item.title: I Am Leaving
item.description: - The video is dedicated to people who have a strong belief in tech billionaires and their products, as well as those who write updates as if they are writing a letter to an absent editor.

item.title: Creating a search engine with PostgreSQL
item.description: - PostgreSQL provides building blocks for creating a search engine for full-text search.

item.title: Vale's first prototype for immutable region borrowing
item.description: - Vale has developed a new approach to memory safety using generational references and region borrowing, which can make code faster and eliminate memory safety overhead.

item.title: Official Mastodon server of the Dutch government
item.description: - The Dutch government has launched its own Mastodon server for social media.

item.title: Telling the Bees
item.description: - Telling the bees is a tradition in many European countries where beekeepers inform their bees about important events in their lives such as deaths, births, marriages, and departures and returns in the household.

item.title: Computer security 80% solved if we deprecate technology shown in this graphic
item.description: - Computer security would be significantly improved if outdated technologies shown in the graphic were deprecated.

item.title: RPCS3 â€“ Open Source Playstation 3 Emulator
item.description: - RPCS3 is an open-source Playstation 3 emulator that allows users to play PS3 games on their computers.

item.title: Milan Kundera has died
item.description: - Milan Kundera, the acclaimed author of "The Unbearable Lightness of Being," has passed away at the age of 94.

item.title: Calls to investigate tax sites for sharing financial information with Meta
item.description: - Democratic senators are calling for an investigation into popular tax filing companies for allegedly sharing taxpayers' financial data with Meta and Google.

item.title: Ask HN: Stubhub buying their own tickets under fake names?
item.description: - There is speculation that Stubhub, a popular ticket reselling platform, may be buying their own tickets using fake names.
